title: Authors in the Park Anthology - Dec 16, 2012
description: On December 16, 2012, several authors from Central Florida gathered at a book signing/sale in Mount Dora. Excerpts of some of their works are highlighted in this complimentary anthology. Featuring: Hidden Earth Series, Vol. 1 Maycly The Trilogy by Janet Beasley Lill and Mewe and the Secrets of Mars by Jean E. Lane The Untold Legend: The Warrior Queen by Amy I. Long The Empyrical Tales Book 1: The Fourth Queen by Mark MillerStarland Vamp Book 1: Star by Theresa Oliver.
author: Mark  Miller
